text: Michel Sordi (born November 9, 1953) is a member of the National Assembly of France. He represents the Haut-Rhin department, and is a member of the Union for a Popular Movement. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:People from Mulhouse Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Michel Sordi
